channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Virtualize
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Virtualize

item.title: CVE-2021-38969|2024-09-17T04:29:37.428Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20virtualize
item.description: IBM Spectrum Virtualize 8.2, 8.3, and 8.4 could allow an attacker to allow unauthorized access due to the reuse of support generated credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 212609.
